data.title: How to save a life
data.lrc_content:
[id: pshjuboh]
[ar: The Fray]
[al: Through the Years: The Best of The Fray]
[ti: How To Save A Life]
[au: Slade & King]
[length: 04:24]

[00:09.56]Step one, you say, "We need to talk"
[00:13.67]He walks, you say, "Sit down, it's just a talk"
[00:18.90]He smiles politely back at you
[00:22.55]You stare politely right on through

[00:26.46]Some sort of window to your right
[00:30.40]As he goes left and you stay right
[00:34.36]Between the lines of fear and blame
[00:38.27]You begin to wonder why you came

[00:41.72]Where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[00:46.13]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[00:49.42]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[00:53.97]Had I known how to save a life

[01:05.29]Let him know that you know best
[01:09.08]'Cause after all, you do know best
[01:13.68]Try to slip past his defense
[01:17.13]Without granting innocence

[01:21.54]Lay down a list of what is wrong
[01:25.74]The things you've told him all along
[01:28.99]Pray to God he hears you
[01:32.38]And I pray to God he hears you

[01:36.17]And where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[01:41.24]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[01:44.51]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[01:49.08]Had I known how to save a life

[02:00.12]As he begins to raise his voice
[02:04.16]You lower yours and grant him one last choice
[02:08.77]Drive until you lose the road
[02:11.99]Or break with the ones you've followed

[02:16.61]He will do one of two things
[02:20.13]He will admit to everything
[02:24.02]Or he'll say he's just not the same
[02:27.53]And you'll begin to wonder why you came

[02:31.93]Where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[02:36.28]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[02:39.55]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[02:44.14]Had I known how to save a life

[02:47.59]Where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[02:52.00]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[02:55.34]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[03:00.40]Had I known how to save a life

[03:09.17]How to save a life
[03:17.11]How to save a life

[03:19.40]Where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[03:23.51]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[03:26.77]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[03:31.37]Had I known how to save a life

[03:34.91]Where did I go wrong? I lost a friend
[03:39.26]Somewhere along in the bitterness
[03:42.51]And I would have stayed up with you all night
[03:47.08]Had I known how to save a life

[03:56.45]How to save a life
[04:04.33]How to save a life

data.title: Not Strong Enough
data.lrc_content:
[ar:Apocalyptica]
[al:Apocalyptica]
[ti:Not Strong enough]
[au:Apocalyptica]
[length:03:16.65]
[by:Lili_lyric$]
[re:www.megalobiz.com/lrc/maker]
[ve:v1.2.3]
[00:11.36]I'm not strong enough to stay away
[00:16.62]I can't run from you
[00:20.11]I just run back to you
[00:23.36]Like a moth, I'm drawn into your flame
[00:28.86]You say my name
[00:31.61]But it's not the same
[00:34.86]You look in my eyes
[00:37.61]I'm stripped of my pride
[00:40.37]And my soul surrenders
[00:43.61]And you bring my heart to its knees
[00:46.11]And it's killing me when you're away
[00:49.11]And I wanna leave, and I wanna stay
[00:51.86]And I'm so confused, so hard to choose
[00:55.12]Between the pleasure and the pain
[00:57.86]And I know it's wrong, and I know it's right
[01:00.86]Even if I try to win the fight
[01:03.37]My heart would overrule my mind
[01:06.61]And I'm not strong enough to stay away
[01:12.20]♪ ♪ ♪
[01:21.61]I'm not strong enough to stay away
[01:27.11]What can I do?
[01:30.61]I would die without you
[01:33.61]In your presence my heart knows no shame
[01:38.86]I'm not to blame
[01:42.62]'Cause you bring my heart to its knees
[01:44.36]And it's killing me when you're away
[01:47.61]And I wanna leave, and I wanna stay
[01:50.37]And I'm so confused, so hard to choose
[01:53.61]Between the pleasure and the pain
[01:56.36]And I know it's wrong, and I know it's right
[01:59.36]Even if I try to win the fight
[02:02.12]My heart would overrule my mind
[02:05.11]And I'm not strong enough to stay away
[02:14.62]There's nothing I can do
[02:17.86]My heart is chained to you
[02:21.86]And I can't get free
[02:26.36]Look what this love's done to me
[02:28.61]And it's killing me when you're away
[02:31.61]And I wanna leave, and I wanna stay
[02:34.36]And I'm so confused, so hard to choose
[02:37.36]Between the pleasure and the pain
[02:40.36]And I know it's wrong, and I know it's right
[02:43.11]Even if I try to win the fight
[02:45.86]My heart would overrule my mind
[02:48.86]And I'm not strong enough to stay away (not strong enough, strong enough)
[02:58.77](strong enough, strong enough) To stay away 
[03:10.00](Not strong enough, strong enough)
[03:12.66]And I'm not strong enough to stay away
[03:1.60]♪ ♪ ♪

data.title: Viva La Vida
data.lrc_content:
[id: azypxbhy]
﻿[ti:Coldplay - Viva La Vida]
[ar:Coldplay]
[al:Viva La Vida]
[00:00.00]♪ ♪ ♪
[00:12.55]I used to rule the world
[00:16.78]Seas would rise when I gave the word
[00:19.52]Now in the morning, I sleep alone
[00:23.69]Sweep the streets I used to own
[00:27.01]♪ ♪ ♪

[00:40.71]I used to roll the dice
[00:44.56]Feel the fear in my enemy's eyes
[00:47.87]Listen as the crowd would sing
[00:51.55]Now the old king is dead, long live the king
[00:54.66]One minute I held the key
[00:58.52]Next the walls were closed on me
[01:01.54]And I discovered that my castles stand
[01:05.36]Upon pillars of salt and pillars of sand

[01:09.77]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
[01:12.99]Roman Cavalry choirs are singing
[01:16.25]Be my mirror, my sword and shield
[01:20.04]My missionaries in a foreign field
[01:23.51]For some reason I can't explain
[01:26.73]Once you go there was never, never an honest word
[01:33.43]And that was when I ruled the world
[01:38.00]♪ ♪ ♪

[01:50.30]It was a wicked and wild wind
[01:54.06]Blew down the doors to let me in
[01:56.84]Shattered windows and the sound of drums
[02:01.10]People couldn't believe what I'd become
[02:04.61]Revolutionaries wait
[02:08.03]For my head on a silver plate
[02:11.09]Just a puppet on a lonely string
[02:14.65]Oh, who would ever want to be king?

[02:18.96]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing
[02:22.61]Roman Calvary choirs are singing
[02:26.06]Be my mirror, my sword and shield
[02:29.43]My missionaries in a foreign field
[02:33.14]For some reason I can't explain
[02:36.43]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[02:39.70]Never an honest word
[02:43.08]But that was when I ruled the world
[02:46.82]♪ ♪ ♪

[03:00.02]Oh-oh-oh
[03:03.02]Oh-oh-oh
[03:06.38]Oh-oh-oh
[03:09.83]Oh-oh-oh
[03:13.43]Oh-oh-oh

[03:15.19]I hear Jerusalem bells are ringing (Oh-oh-oh)
[03:18.18]Roman Calvary choirs are singing (Oh-oh-oh)
[03:21.73]Be my mirror, my sword and shield (Oh-oh-oh)
[03:25.02]My missionaries in a foreign field (Oh-oh-oh)
[03:28.64]For some reason I can't explain (Oh-oh-oh)
[03:32.09]I know Saint Peter won't call my name
[03:35.87]Never an honest word
[03:38.75]But that was when I ruled the world

[re:www.megalobiz.com/lrc/maker]

[00:19.13]Years ago, when I was younger
[00:23.13]I kinda liked a girl I knew
[00:27.61]She was mine, and we were sweethearts
[00:31.86]That was then, but then it's true
[00:36.37]I'm in love with a fairytale
[00:40.90]Even though it hurts
[00:45.37]'Cause I don't care if I lose my mind
[00:49.36]I'm already cursed
[00:55.00]♪♪♪
[01:12.87]Every day we started fighting
[01:17.63]Every night we fell in love
[01:22.13]No one else could make me sadder
[01:26.62]But no one else could lift me high above
[01:31.12]I don't know what I was doing
[01:35.39]When suddenly, we fell apart
[01:40.14]Nowadays, I cannot find her
[01:44.11]But when I do, we'll get a brand-new start
[01:50.87]I'm in love with a fairytale
[01:55.63]Even though it hurts
[01:59.61]'Cause I don't care if I lose my mind
[02:04.37]I'm already cursed
[02:09.00]♪♪♪

[02:35.64]Even know it hurts, 'cause
[02:40.14]I don't care if I lose my mind
[02:44.36]I'm already cursed
[02:48.90]♪♪♪

[02:40.63]You need me

[02:47.69]I know you want me too
[02:49.64]I think you want me too

[02:54.23]Because you're going to

data.title: 7 Years
data.lrc_content:
[ar: Lukas Graham]
[al: Lukas Graham]
[ti: 7 Years]
[au: Lukas Forchhammer Graham,
Morten Ristorp, Stefan Forrest]
[length: 3:57]
[00:04:12]♪ ♪ ♪
[00:20.45]Once I was 7 years old, my mama told me
[00:24.81]Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonely
[00:28.26]Once I was 7 years old
[00:30.92]♪ ♪ ♪
[00:36.75]It was a big, big world but we thought we were bigger
[00:40.77]Pushing each other to the limits, we were learning quicker
[00:44.77]By 11 smoking herb, and drinking burning liquor
[00:48.84]Never rich so we were out to make that steady figure
[00:52.42]
[00:52.61]Once I was 11 years old, my daddy told me,
[00:56.81]Go get yourself a wife or you'll be lonely
[01:00.26]Once I was 11 years old
[01:02.92]♪ ♪ ♪
[01:08.62]I always had that dream, like my daddy before me
[01:12.62]So I started writing songs, I started writing stories
[01:16.66]Something about that glory, just always seemed to bore me
[01:20.66]'cus only those I really love will ever really know me
[01:24.53]
[01:24.66]Once I was 20 years old, my story got told
[01:28.92]Before the morning sun, when life was lonely
[01:32.31]Once I was 20 years old
[01:35.24]
[01:36.18](Lukas Graham)
[01:38.22]
[01:40.75]I only see my goals, I don't believe in failure,
[01:44.77]'cus I know the smallest voices, they can make it major,
[01:48.87]I got my boys with me, at least those in favour
[01:52.82]And if we don't meet before I leave, I hope I'll see you later
[01:56.32]
[01:56.55]Once I was 20 years old, my story got told
[02:00.89]I was writing about everything I saw before me
[02:04.26]Once I was 20 years old
[02:07.47]♪ ♪ ♪
[02:12.49]Soon we'll be 30 years old, our songs have been sold
[02:16.96]We've traveled around the world and we're still roaming
[02:20.35]Soon we'll be 30 years old
[02:23.07]
[02:28.92]I'm still learning about life
[02:30.77]My woman brought children for me
[02:32.68]So I can sing them all my songs
[02:34.93]And I can tell them stories
[02:36.76]Most of my boys are with me
[02:38.58]Some are still out seeking glory
[02:40.65]And some I had to leave behind
[02:42.76]My brother, I'm still sorry
[02:44.46]
[02:44.65]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[02:46.81]My daddy got 61
[02:48.82]Remember life and then your life becomes a better one
[02:52.56]I made a man so happy when I wrote a letter once
[02:56.66]I hope my children come and visit once or twice a month
[03:00.29]
[03:00.48]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:02.80]Will I think the world is cold,
[03:04.86]or will I have a lot of children who can bore me
[03:08.31]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:10.85]♪ ♪ ♪
[03:16.41]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:18.79]Will I think the world is cold,
[03:21.06]or will I have a lot of children who can bore me
[03:24.27]Soon I'll be 60 years old
[03:27.09]♪ ♪ ♪
[03:32.37]Once I was 7 years old, my mama told me
[03:36.97]Go make yourself some friends or you'll be lonely
[03:40.36]Once I was 7 years old
[03:42.85]♪ ♪ ♪
[03:48.49]Once I was 7 years old
[03:51.54]
[03:53.55]

[02:40.74]Ooh-ooh, ah
[02:44.46]Don't wanna leave you anymore
[02:47.65]Oh, darling, all of the city lights
[02:50.57]Never shine as bright as your eyes
[02:53.75]I would trade them all for a minute more
[02:56.94]But the car's outside
[02:58.80]And he's called me twice

data.title: War Of Change
data.lrc_content:
[id: pshckuql]
[al: The End Is Where We Begin]
[ar: Thousand Foot Krutch]
[ti: War Of Change]
[00:00.00]♪♪
[00:09.09]It's a truth that in love and war
[00:13.90]Worlds collide and hearts get broken
[00:18.67]I want to live like I know I'm dying
[00:22.83]Take up my cross, not be afraid
[00:27.54]Is it true what they say, that words are weapons?
[00:29.77]And if it is, then everybody best stop steppin'
[00:32.14]'Cause I got ten in my pocket that'll bend ya locket
[00:34.32]I'm tired of all these rockers sayin' come with me
[00:36.89]Wait, it's just about to break, it's more than I can take
[00:43.03]Everything's about to change
[00:46.93]I feel it in my veins, it's not going away
[00:52.14]Everything's about to change
[00:56.03]It creeps in like a thief in the night
[00:59.70]Without a sign, without a warning
[01:04.71]But we are ready and prepared to fight
[01:08.79]Raise up your swords, don't be afraid
[01:13.53]Is it true what they say, that words are weapons?
[01:15.74]And if it is, then everybody best stop steppin'
[01:18.10]'Cause I got ten in my pocket that'll bend ya locket
[01:20.35]I'm tired of all these rockers sayin' come with me
[01:22.97]Wait, it's just about to break, it's more than I can take
[01:28.90]Everything's about to change
[01:33.09]I feel it in my veins, it's not going away
[01:38.24]Everything's about to change
[01:41.73]This is a warning, like it or not
[01:45.26]I break down, like a record spinning
[01:48.40]Gotta get up
[01:49.81]So back off
[01:51.07]This is a warning, like it or not
[01:54.41]I'm tired of listenin', I'm warning you, don't try to get up
[02:00.09]There's a war going on inside of me tonight (Don't be afraid)
[02:09.34]There's a war going on inside of me tonight (Don't be afraid)
[02:20.73]Wait, it's just about to break, it's more than I can take
[02:26.72]Everything's about to change
[02:30.73]I feel it in my veins, it's not going away
[02:36.09]Everything's about to change
[02:40.03]It's just about to break, it's more than I can take
[02:45.14]Everything's about to change
[02:49.25]I feel it in my veins, it's not going away
[02:54.54]Everything's about to change
[02:58.00]♪♪

[02:56.51]Only then I am clean

[03:06.90]Aaa, Amen, Amen, Amen

[03:18.41]I'll worship like a dog at the shrine of your lies
